attributes.action: Ben Wallance to be removed from Parliament immediately.
attributes.additional_details: Ben Wallace has proven to be someone totally untrustworthy of position. Pen Nowzad and others  would have been saved from the Talliban. His actions and words have despicable from the start.
attributes.background: Remove Ben Wallace from post immediately given his immoral attitude towards Pen Farthing, his lack of humanity, and total disregard for life human and animal.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs or Ministers to be sacked or for them to resign.
